title: AFRICA - Congo Songs & Dances (vinyl rip)
description:
CLICK ON starinar TO GET MORE TRIBAL, RITUAL, SACRED AND INDIGENOUS MUSIC. ENJoY!

HUGH TRACEY RECORDINGS - Congo Songs & Dances

Hugh Tracey, 1903 - 1977

Hugh Tracey recorded extensively from the Sudan border down to the Cape of Good Hope. A whole sub-continent, a life's work! He was one of the pioneers of ethnomusicology and was responsible more than anybody else for 'putting African music on the map'. Indeed, if you put your finger almost anywhere on a map of that half of Africa, you will find a closely corresponding recording in Tracey's vast output. Most important of all, many of his recordings are the only recordings of certain musics which have long since disappeared.

HiQuality: 320Kbps + full cover scans



This OLD collection of Hugh Tracey recordings is very hard to get.
I released No.1, No.7 and No.8 - If you have any other recordings
